original: intros f x H1 H2. unfold ex_lim, Lim in H1. unfold Lim in H2. unfold ex_lim, Lim. destruct H1 as [l H1]. destruct H1 as [H1 H1']. apply is_lim_inv in H1. - apply Rbar_inv_opp in H1'. rewrite H1'. apply is_lim_unique. apply is_lim_comp with (f := fun y : R => /f y) (l := Rbar_inv l). + apply H1. + apply Rbar_inv_opp. intro H3. apply H2. rewrite H3. apply Rinv_0_lt_compat. apply H2. - intro H3. apply H2. rewrite H3. apply Rinv_0_lt_compat. apply H2.
